mapper.sql: ARRANGE_FLOW, TRAINING_TYPE_ID, TRAINING_TYPE_NAME, TRAINING_SPE_ID, TRAINING_SPE_NAME, SESSION_NUMBER, ASSESSMENT_YEAR, EXAMPAPER_TYPE, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, ASSESSMENT_START_TIME, ASSESSMENT_END_TIME, IS_OPEN, EXAM_NUMBER, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, EXAM_DURATION, EXAM_START_TIME, EXAM_END_TIME, IS_APP, IS_WEB, IS_OPEN_RESULT, PAPER_FLOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from SCH_EXAM_ARRANGEMENT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SCH_EXAM_ARRANGEMENT (ARRANGE_FLOW, TRAINING_TYPE_ID, TRAINING_TYPE_NAME, TRAINING_SPE_ID, TRAINING_SPE_NAME, SESSION_NUMBER, ASSESSMENT_YEAR, EXAMPAPER_TYPE, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, ASSESSMENT_START_TIME, ASSESSMENT_END_TIME, IS_OPEN, EXAM_NUMBER, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, EXAM_DURATION, EXAM_START_TIME, EXAM_END_TIME, IS_APP, IS_WEB, IS_OPEN_RESULT) values (#{arrangeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingSpeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingSpeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessmentYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exampaperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessmentStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessmentEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOpenResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update SCH_EXAM_ARRANGEMENT set TRAINING_TYPE_ID = #{trainingTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAINING_TYPE_NAME = #{trainingTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAINING_SPE_ID = #{trainingSpeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAINING_SPE_NAME = #{trainingSpeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SESSION_NUMBER = #{sessionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSESSMENT_YEAR = #{assessmentYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAMPAPER_TYPE = #{exampaperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_FLOW = #{orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSESSMENT_START_TIME = #{assessmentStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSESSMENT_END_TIME = #{assessmentEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_OPEN = #{isOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_NUMBER = #{examNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_DURATION = #{examDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_START_TIME = #{examStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAM_END_TIME = #{examEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_APP = #{isApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_WEB = #{isWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_OPEN_RESULT = #{isOpenResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ARRANGE_FLOW = #{arrangeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT su.USER_NAME, rd.TRAINING_SPE_NAME, su.USER_CODE, su.USER_PHONE, su.ID_NO, LISTAGG(sasdc.STANDARD_DEPT_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY 1) AS DEPT_NAME FROM RES_DOCTOR_SCH_PROCESS rdsp, SCH_AND_STANDARD_DEPT_CFG sasdc, SYS_USER su, RES_DOCTOR rd WHERE RDSP.USER_FLOW = su.USER_FLOW AND rd.DOCTOR_FLOW = su.USER_FLOW AND su.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND rd.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND RDSP.SCH_END_DATE >= #{schStartDate} AND RDSP.SCH_START_DATE <= #{schEndDate} AND RDSP.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND sasdc.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND sasdc.sch_dept_flow = rdsp.sch_dept_flow AND rdsp.org_flow = sasdc.org_flow and rd.TRAINING_SPE_ID = #{trainingSpeId} and rd.SESSION_NUMBER = #{sessionNumber} and rd.org_flow = #{orgFlow}
and su.USER_CODE is not null and su.USER_PHONE is not null and su.ID_NO is not null GROUP BY su.USER_NAME, rd.TRAINING_SPE_NAME, su.USER_CODE, su.USER_PHONE, su.ID_NO
